headline: 75 Drug Cartel Members Use Help From Guards To Flee Paraguay Prison
abstract: The government had known for weeks that a Brazilian drug cartel was plotting a prison break, but it was unable to stop it.
lead_paragraph: ASUNCIÓN, Paraguay — At least 75 members of a powerful Brazilian drug cartel escaped from a prison in northern Paraguay through a tunnel on Sunday, pulling off an escape plan that officials had known about for more than a month but were unable to stop.
